data.title: Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary enjoy their pregnancy journey; shared an adorable video
data.meta_description: Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary, the beloved couple from Bigg Boss 9, are celebrating a new chapter in their lives with the announcement of their
data.text:
Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary, the beloved couple from Bigg Boss 9, are celebrating a new chapter in their lives with the announcement of their pregnancy. Married since 2018, the couple recently shared the joyous news with their fans on Instagram.

Prince Narula posted a charming video showcasing him and his wife spending quality time together. The heartfelt caption read, “Happy pregnancy to us.” The video captures the couple enjoying a delightful breakfast and Prince playfully splashing rainwater on Yuvika’s baby bump.

The video transitions to the couple taking a romantic walk in the rain, highlighting their love for each other and the beauty of nature. The clip beautifully captures their excitement and happiness as they prepare to welcome their first child.

Prince and Yuvika’s love story began on the sets of Bigg Boss 9, where they met and fell in love. After a period of courtship, they were married in a grand ceremony in October 2018. Prince Narula, known for winning four reality TV shows, including Roadies X2, Splitsvilla 8, Bigg Boss 9, and Nach Baliye 9, has had an impressive journey in the entertainment industry.

Yuvika Chaudhary, recognized for her role in the film Om Shanti Om and her participation in Bigg Boss 9 and Nach Baliye 9, has also carved out a successful career in the industry. Their pregnancy announcement received an outpouring of love and congratulations from friends and fans. Celebrities like Gauahar Khan, Neha Dhupia, Anita Hassanandani, and Priyank Sharma were among those who sent their warm wishes to the couple.
